properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters From Point Grenville To Cape Shoalwater Out 10 Nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 2 at 3:08AM PST until March 4 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas 10 to 11 feet at 16 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters From Point Grenville To Cape Shoalwater
Out 10 Nm.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or higher are expected to produce hazardous
wave conditions to small craft. Inexperienced mariners,
especially those operating smaller vessels should avoid
navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY
